name: 60+ Useful Resources for UI/UX Designers
description:
Get access to a curated list of 60+ useful resources for UI/UX designers to help you grow as a designer faster.

It has resources on the following topics:

  • User Experience Design
  • User Interface Design
  • Design Process
  • Design System
  • Figma
  • Motion Design
  • Icons
  • Illustrations
  • Free Stock Images & Videos
  • Free mentorship
  • Design Career
  • Remote Jobs
  • Startup Jobs
  • Internships
  • Full-time Jobs
  • Freelancing


FAQs

How to use the template?

There is a small tutorial inside the notion page showing how to use it properly.


How to use the template?

Send your feedback or queries to thevectorscontact@gmail.com or drop a hi on LinkedIn
